0.0 = 0x0
sqrt(0.0) = 0.0 (0x0)

-0.0 = 0x80000000
sqrt(-0.0) = -0.0 (0x80000000)

-42.0 = 0xc2280000
sqrt(-42.0) = NaN (0x7fc00000)

inf = 0x7f800000
sqrt(inf) = inf (0x7f800000)

-inf = 0xff800000
sqrt(-inf) = NaN (0x7fc00000)

NaN = 0x7fc00000
sqrt(NaN) = NaN (0x7fc00000)

1.40129846e-45 = 0x1
sqrt(1.40129846e-45) = 3.74339207e-23 (0x1a3504f3)

2.80259693e-45 = 0x2
sqrt(2.80259693e-45) = 5.29395592e-23 (0x1a800000)

5.87747175e-39 = 0x400000
sqrt(5.87747175e-39) = 7.66646695e-20 (0x1fb504f3)

1.17549421e-38 = 0x7fffff
sqrt(1.17549421e-38) = 1.08420211e-19 (0x1fffffff)

1.17549435e-38 = 0x800000
sqrt(1.17549435e-38) = 1.08420217e-19 (0x20000000)

1.0 = 0x3f800000
sqrt(1.0) = 1.0 (0x3f800000)

0.99999994 = 0x3f7fffff
sqrt(0.99999994) = 0.99999994 (0x3f7fffff)

1.00000012 = 0x3f800001
sqrt(1.00000012) = 1.0 (0x3f800000)

0.999999881 = 0x3f7ffffe
sqrt(0.999999881) = 0.99999994 (0x3f7fffff)

1.00000024 = 0x3f800002
sqrt(1.00000024) = 1.00000012 (0x3f800001)

0.5 = 0x3f000000
sqrt(0.5) = 0.707106769 (0x3f3504f3)

2.0 = 0x40000000
sqrt(2.0) = 1.41421354 (0x3fb504f3)

2.71828175 = 0x402df854
sqrt(2.71828175) = 1.64872122 (0x3fd3094c)

3.14159274 = 0x40490fdb
sqrt(3.14159274) = 1.7724539 (0x3fe2dfc5)

9.31322575e-10 = 0x30800000
sqrt(9.31322575e-10) = 3.05175781e-5 (0x38000000)

1.07374182e9 = 0x4e800000
sqrt(1.07374182e9) = 32768.0 (0x47000000)

sqrt(2.3509887e-38) = 1.53329339e-19 (0x203504f3)

sqrt(3.40282347e38) = 1.8446743e19 (0x5f7fffff)

1.00000001e-10 = 0x2edbe6ff
sqrt(1.00000001e-10) = 9.99999975e-6 (0x3727c5ac)

1.0e10 = 0x501502f9
sqrt(1.0e10) = 100000.0 (0x47c35000)
